info.name: ASB Bipek Non-Standard Module API Collection
info.description: API collection for ASB Bipek Non-Standard module - manages BPNS (Bangunan Pekerjaan Non-Standar) records for ASB entries

item.name: ASB Bipek Non-Standard
Get ASB Bipek Non-Standard by ASB

query.description: ID of the ASB to get Bipek Non-Standard records for

request.description: Get all ASB Bipek Non-Standard (BPNS) records for a specific ASB with pagination. Requires OPD, VERIFIKATOR, ADMIN, or SUPERADMIN role.

item.description: Endpoints for retrieving ASB Bipek Non-Standard (BPNS - Bangunan Pekerjaan Non-Standar) records
